availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Jane Peden Kennedy in 1823. Married Mariah Willoughby Kennedy in 1861.

bibl.p: Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Todd County, 1823. Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Todd County, 1861. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 10. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 4, p. 14. “William Thompson Kennedy,” Find A Grave, February 3, 2010, memorial no. 47516878 (accessed March 23, 2017).
